channel.title: CVE Feed for iniNet Solutions -- SpiderControl SCADA PC HMI Editor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for iniNet Solutions -- SpiderControl SCADA PC HMI Editor

item.title: CVE-2024-10313|2024-10-24T18:29:45.979Z -- ininet%20solutions -- spidercontrol%20scada%20pc%20hmi%20editor
item.description: iniNet Solutions SpiderControl SCADA PC HMI Editor has a path traversal vulnerability. When the software loads a malicious ‘ems' project template file constructed by an attacker, it can write files to arbitrary directories. This can lead to overwriting system files, causing system paralysis, or writing to startup items, resulting in remote control.

item.title: CVE-2024-10313|2024-10-24T17:41:56.069Z -- ininet%20solutions -- spidercontrol%20scada%20pc%20hmi%20editor
item.description: iniNet Solutions SpiderControl SCADA PC HMI Editor has a path traversal vulnerability. When the software loads a malicious ‘ems' project template file constructed by an attacker, it can write files to arbitrary directories.
